title: Tottenham vs Crystal Palace player ratings: Son Heung-min stars as Spurs blow away visitors
text:
Tottenham thrashed Crystal Palace 4-0 to move into the top four of the Premier League table.

An early double from Son Heung-min set Spurs on their way before Patrick van Aanholt put into his own net.

Erik Lamela added a fourth from a flowing counter attack before half-time.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

And that meant Tottenham could enjoy a comfortable second half, comfortably shutting down the game to secure a first Premier League win in four games.

Here are our player ratings for both sets of players:
description: Tottenham thrashed Crystal Palace 4-0 to move into the top four of the Premier League table. An early double from Son Heung-min set Spurs on their way before Patrick van Aanholt put into his own net. Erik Lamela added a fourth from a flowing counter attack before half-time.
